name: Bottle Flip 3D Arcade
description:
New Bottle Flip challenge 3d Arcade!
Flip the water bottle! Try get max score and open new levels!

Do it many times everything!

Simple bottle control:
- first touch for set force
- second touch - set rotation speed!

Be a master of Bottle Flip Challenge!
Can you beat your friends in this app? Try to get best score!!!
